name: ddp-apollo
description: DDP integration for the Apollo Client.

scripts.publish: meteor npm install && meteor npm run eslint -s && meteor npm run doctoc -s && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && rm -rf ./test && meteor publish && cd ./packages/apollo-link-ddp && meteor npm publish
scripts.setup-test: cd packages/apollo-link-ddp && npm install && npm build && cd ../../ && rm -rf ./test && meteor create --bare test && cd test && meteor npm i --save selenium-webdriver@3 chromedriver @babel/runtime@7.2.0
scripts.test: meteor npm run setup-test && cd test && METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS=../ TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome meteor test-packages --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ../
scripts.test-watch: meteor npm run setup-test && cd test && TEST_WATCH=1 METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS=../ TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome meteor test-packages --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ../

author: Michiel ter Reehorst
